ADMIN.ALREADY_MUTED: ❌Error: This member is already muted, you cannot mute this member twice!
ADMIN.MESSAGE_DELETED: ❌Error: An error occurred when deleting the messages, make sure they are not older than 14 days
ADMIN.VALID_AMOUNT: ❌Error: amount must be a valid number and below 100
ADMIN.NO_ARGS: ❌Error: You need to tell me at least 1 argument
ADMIN.NO_CHANNEL_ID: ❌Error: You need to tell me a channel ID to work..
ADMIN.NO_PREFIX_MENTIONED: ❌Error: No prefix mentioned, please try again!
ADMIN.NO_USER_BANNED: ❌Error: Nobody was banned from this server.

MUSIC.NOTHING_PLAYING: ❌Error: There's nothing playing at this moment!
MUSIC.NO_VALIDATE: ❌Error: I cant search by words, please provide a link!
MUSIC.USER_NOT_JOINED: ❌Error: User is not in a channel!
MUSIC.NO_SONG: ❌Error: There's no song that i could skip or stop for you.

COMMANDS.OWNER_ONLY: ❌Error: Sorry, this command can only be used by the bot owners.
COMMANDS.SERVER_ONLY: ❌Error: Sorry, this command can only be used in a discord server.
COMMANDS.NSFW_ONLY: ❌Error: Sorry, this command can only be ran in a NSFW marked channel.
